content: We're getting a lot of CI failures which are unrelated to code. What to do about that? Eg #10929 doesn't show up on the #queue, albeit it is ready.
We have noticed this. I expect this is transient and in the meantime I've been looking at the #queue except removing the -status:failure parameter.
Proactive! Love it :octopus:
So I'll stop relaunching jobs until I get CI-lucky :grinning:
#11259 seems also affected by CI problems that have nothing to do with building mathlib. Should I re-run the jobs to get it merged?

Error: API rate limit exceeded for installation ID 5948897.

I've seen this error before :thinking:
It is the same as in the #5698 thread (I'm on mobile and can't find a way to get the URL for the exact message).
